leadText.title: Bank/Independent guarantee for a tender with a 1.5% commission

bannerText.title: Independent Guarantee
text: Since January 1, 2022, an independent guarantee has replaced a bank guarantee in the procurements under 44-FZ.

Bank guarantees are issued exclusively by banks. Independent guarantees are issued not only by banks listed by the Ministry of Finance, but also by other financial organizations (paragraph 1 of Article 45 of the 44-FZ).

items.title: Bank/Independent guarantee for a tender with a 1.5% commission
text: Obtaining an independent guarantee with one document from 15 minutes. All processes are available online

cardLink.title: Obtaining an independent guarantee with one document from 15 minutes

cardBottom.title: Any guarantees: 44-Fz 223-FZ, 185-FZ (615 PP RF), Commercial bidding
The amount of the guarantee is not limited
We work with tough cases all over Russia

content.text: Money is required for the fulfillment of the contract, but not for a deposit to the customer
The amount of collateral for the lots won exceeds the available funds
The customer delays payment under the previously concluded contract
An advance payment is required under the contract

items.title: Nowadays, the guarantee is issued in a few hours online.
text: Bank/independent guarantee is an access to public procurements and commercial procurements without extracting your own funds from circulation. The availability of funds for the fulfillment of the procurement is a prerequisite for most tenders. The issuance of a bank guarantee acts as a security for the contract.

cards.title: A guarantee for the purposes of participation
cards.text: Securing an application for participation in the procurement in the form of an independent guarantee

cards.title: A guarantee for the purposes of contract fulfillment
cards.text: A written obligation under which the bank will pay the amount of damage if the contractor does not fulfill its obligations under the contract

cards.title: A guarantee for the purposes of advance payment repayment
cards.text: The Bank guarantees the refund of the advance payment provided by the customer to the contractor if the contract is not fulfilled. The amount of the guarantee is equal to the amount of the advance payment received by the supplier

cards.title: A guarantee for the purposes of the contract fulfillment
cards.text: It is used to secure buyer’s fulfillment of the payment obligations stipulated in the contract, covers the risk of non-payment (late payment) from the buyer's side

cards.title: Payment Guarantee
cards.text: A guarantee to secure the buyer’s fulfillment of the payment obligations stipulated in the contract. It is based on the payment terms of the contract and covers the risk of non-payment (late payment) from the buyer's side.

cards.title: A guarantee for the purposes of securing warranty obligations
cards.text: The type of security that is necessary if the customer requires the warranty period for the goods, works or services

infolist.title: 5 reasons why companies choose our service

items.title: Speed of operation
items.text: You will receive a draft bank guarantee within 15 minutes, and the issuance of a scan of the guarantee is possible within an hour after payment

items.title: Reliability
items.text: TEK-Torg is a federal electronic platform selected and certified by the Ministry of Finance of Russia

items.title: Saving of time
items.text: Your personal manager independently prepares the necessary documents and sends an application to the banks

items.title: Work all over Russia
items.text: We provide services in each region in electronic form, without personal visits and visits to banks

items.title: Favorable conditions
items.text: We offer minimum rates due to the absence of intermediaries

textCard.title: Fixed rate at 2.3%, up to 5 million. rubles
text: Only for suppliers of the ETP TEK-Torg any bank guarantees are subject to a fixed rate of 2.3%. Up to 5 million rubles, a guarantee can only be obtained with a passport.
